lyric:
[by:groovypark]
[00:21.98][Hook]
[00:24.62]I got a bitch to hold me down
[00:26.21]I got a bitch to roll the loud
[00:28.36]I got a bitch who's gon' make me proud
[00:30.75]I got a bitch with a backbone
[00:33.34]And she ready just in case a nigga act wrong
[00:35.94]
[00:36.35][Bridge]
[00:36.55]I don't even trust these bitches they be plottin'
[00:39.21]They don't even need me, they got options
[00:42.21]That's why my shawty always down to get it rockin'
[00:45.44]Still there even when I wasn't poppin'
[00:48.08]
[00:48.76][Verse 1]
[00:48.96]Champagne now my go-to on the menu
[00:51.88]Watch a nigga shut it down when I hit the venue
[00:54.72]I don't hit the avenue cause they be clockin'
[00:57.74]Niggas on the corner neighborhood watchin'
[01:00.96]4/20 friendly, yeah she like to roll my weed up
[01:04.48]Speed dial if I need a bitch beat up
[01:07.88]Real bitch so everything g'd up
[01:11.05]Independent, she don't even need love
[01:13.79]
[01:14.00][Hook]
[01:14.26]Got a bitch to hold me down
[01:16.29]I got a bitch to roll the loud
[01:17.92]I got a bitch who's gon' make me proud
[01:20.23]I got a bitch with a backbone
[01:22.87]And she ready just in case a nigga act wrong
[01:25.53]
[01:25.79][Bridge]
[01:26.00]I don't even trust these bitches they be plottin'
[01:28.84]They don't even need me they got options
[01:31.96]That's why my shawty always down to get it rockin'
[01:35.11]Still there even when I wasn't poppin'
[01:37.87]
[01:38.17][Verse 2]
[01:40.01]Gold chain on my neck that's the reward
[01:42.82]Bout to get a few stamps on my passport
[01:45.97]I just got a lil bread but I need more
[01:49.02]And go places I ain't never been before
[01:52.09]Walk past with that Mary Jane perfume
[01:55.21]Smokin' loud in the ****ing hotel room
[01:58.32]So much things that I wanna tell you
[02:01.48]But I feel like we about to go to hell soon
[02:04.08]
[02:04.24][Hook]
[02:04.43]I got a bitch to hold me down
[02:05.40]I got a bitch to roll the loud
[02:07.39]I got a bitch who's gon' make me proud
[02:10.57]I got a bitch with a backbone
[02:12.82]And she ready just in case a nigga act wrong
[02:15.73]
[02:15.93][Bridge]
[02:16.14]I don't even trust these bitches they be plottin'
[02:19.19]They don't even need me they got options
[02:22.16]That's why my shawty always down to get it rockin'
[02:25.26]Still there even when I wasn't poppin'
[02:28.39]
[02:28.75][Outro]
[02:36.28]So much things that I wanna tell you
[02:39.45]But I feel like we about to go to hell soo
tlyric:
[by:Lerbb]
[00:24.62]曾有个女孩使我堕落
[00:26.21]曾有个女孩使我心潮澎湃
[00:28.36]曾有个女孩令我骄傲
[00:30.75]曾有个女孩令我心神颠倒
[00:33.34]但是她现在小心翼翼地着苟事
[00:36.55]我难以相信这些女孩们在密谋
[00:39.21]她们已经不需要我了，早已个有归宿
[00:42.21]这就是为什么我总想让我的宝贝挺起来
[00:45.44]尽管我不会有反应
[00:48.96]香槟依然是我菜单上的首选
[00:51.88]看到一个黑鬼，我一会儿进场就把他干掉
[00:54.72]但我没有进场，因为他们在打卡
[00:57.74]黑鬼们在街角窥探
[01:00.96]4/20的好人，她想把我卷入纷争
[01:04.48]赶紧拨电话，我需要有一个
[01:07.88]真正的jian人来殴打这个biao子
[01:11.05]这个biao子甚至都不需要爱
[01:14.26]曾有个女孩使我堕落
[01:16.29]曾有个女孩使我心潮澎湃
[01:17.92]曾有个女孩令我骄傲
[01:20.23]曾有个女孩令我心神颠倒
[01:22.87]但是她现在小心翼翼地着苟事
[01:26.00]我难以相信这些女孩们在密谋
[01:28.84]她们已经不需要我了，她们早已有归宿
[01:31.96]这就是为什么我总想让我的宝贝挺起来
[01:35.11]尽管我不会有反应
[01:40.01]我脖子上的金链子就是奖赏
[01:42.82]我想在我的护照上贴几张邮票
[01:45.97]我现在只有一点钱，我需要更多
[01:49.02]去我从没去过的地方
[01:52.09]带着玛丽简香水味走荡四方
[01:55.21]在**旅馆房间里肆无忌惮抽烟
[01:58.32]想给你诉说的事太多了
[02:01.48]但我们马上要分道扬镳，各自风流了
[02:04.43]曾有个女孩使我堕落
